main event: The observer sighted a bright blue light that was seen for 60 seconds and was about as bright as a fourth magnitude star.
interesting points: The observer stated that he sighted the light when it was directly overhead, but in his letter said the light disappeared in the North and that the first time he saw it was in August.
The observer also saw a UFO, but the details are not provided.
The report notes conflicting data in the observer's account.
The Department of the Air Force requested the observer to complete an attached form to provide additional information for further investigation.
The report form includes sections for the observer to provide details about the sighting, such as the date, time, location, direction, elevation, size, motion, and any other notable observations.
